My book just got here. I don't know if I'll be able to
put it down until I've finished it.
Lawrita

messages.subject: Thanks Lesa!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Way back on Feb. 28 Lesa suggested I read the Teenage Liberation Handbook.  We couldn t find it.  Just as I was starting to feel pressure from the rest of
messages.messageBody:
Way back on Feb. 28 Lesa suggested I read the Teenage Liberation Handbook. We couldn't
find it. Just as I was starting to feel "pressure" from the rest of the world(grandparents,
friends, school friends of Lily's) the book appeared, our local librarian found it. It has helped,
and I just got it yesterday!! Lily is reading it a bit also. So far so good, Thanks for pointing
me in the direction that allowed me to trust her and myself. Melanie in Vt
